titleStmt.title: The second replie of Thomas Cartwright: agaynst Maister Doctor Whitgiftes second answer, touching the Churche discipline
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1535-1603.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Whitgift, John. The defense of the Aunswere to the Admonition, against the Replie of T.C.
Printer's name and address from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
